item.title: Bagley's Law of Scientific Publication Access
item.description: Find Open Access scholarly articles online for free The topic is peer-reviewed scientific articles (primary or secondary literature). Also, we’ll assume that you’re not searching for a paper from an Open Access publisher. Let’s also assumeÂ that library holdings / subscriptions at your institution have gaps–they do not cover every journal in your field over every possible time period. Then, Bagley’s Law of Scientific Publication Access is: “When you need an article, you will not have free access to it, but you will have access to plenty of articles that you don’t want and you don’t need.
